channel.title: Table/load not loading table when live
channel.description: I have a few parameter settings written into a table that I want to load when the patch starts up. So the data is in a file on the sd card and I use table/load to load on startup. While this works well once I use Axoloti standalone, it doesn't work when I go live. This is how it looks like: "state 2" is on the main directory on the sd card

item.title: Table/load not loading table when live
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Ok thx solution 1 seems to work!

Read full topic
item.source: Table/load not loading table when live

item.title: Table/load not loading table when live
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Blindsmyth:

"state 2" is on the main directory on the sd card

All but auto-startup patches look for files in a directory named with the patch name.
(this is to avoid confusion, one patch could (over)write files used by another patch)

Solution 1: you put a "/" in front of the filename, and keep the file in the sdcard root directory.
Solution 2: you move the file to the directory with the patch name, and start the patch indirectly through patch/load i.

Read full topic
item.source: Table/load not loading table when live
